result.reason: DataTableDeserializer crashes with InvalidCastException when SQL columns contain DBNull, because it uses direct (string)dataRow[] casts instead of null-safe patterns
result.approach: Replace direct (string)dataRow[col] casts with as string ?? defaultValue pattern (already used for ConstantID on line 59), and wrap (int)dataRow[col] and Enum.Parse casts with IsNull checks falling back to ConnectionInfo defaults
